Parameters: DialogInterface: the dialog that was canceled will be passed into the method
onCancel(android.content.DialogInterface.Description: This method will be invoked when the dialog is canceled.

ClassDesc: Interface used to allow the creator of a dialog to run some code when the dialog is canceled. This will only be called when the dialog is canceled, if the creator needs to know when it is dismissed in general, use @B_android#content#DialogInterface#OnDismissListener_E@.
